snippet: The opposition leader in the Georgian enclave of South Ossetia was to be inaugurated as president, but her plans were thwarted by police officers apparently acting on Russia’s orders.
abstract: Police in South Ossetia, Georgia, disrupt the unauthorized inauguration ceremony of opposition leader Alla A Dzhioeva, apparently acting on Russia's orders; crushing of the opposition movement comes at a delicate moment as Russia has struggled to install is favored leaders in the republic.
lead_paragraph: The opposition leader in the Georgian enclave of South Ossetia was to be inaugurated as president, but her plans were thwarted by police officers apparently acting on Russia’s orders.

headline.seo: Turmoil Erupts in Kremlin-Protected South Ossetia
headline.main: Turmoil Erupts in a Kremlin-Protected Enclave
headline.print_headline: Turmoil Erupts in a Kremlin-Protected Enclave
